statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT facility_id, energy_usage_kwh, facility_location FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY facility_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT facility_location, energy_usage_kwh FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage_kwh) AS average_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE facility_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_location, energy_usage_kwh FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption_date >= '2022-01-01' AND consumption_date < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY energy_usage_kwh DESC;
SELECT facility_location, SUM(energy_usage_kwh) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY facility_location HAVING total_energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT facility_location FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage_kwh > 5000 ORDER BY facility_location ASC;
SELECT facility_id, AVG(energy_usage_kwh) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY facility_id HAVING avg_energy_usage < 5000 ORDER BY avg_energy_usage ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT facility_id, timestamp, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT facility_id, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE facility_id = 1
SELECT * FROM facilities ORDER BY facility_id
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities
SELECT facility_id, timestamp, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE facility_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE operational_cost > 1000
SELECT * FROM facilities INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data ON facilities.facility_id = energy_consumption_data.facility_id ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC
SELECT facility_id, avg(energy_consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY facility_id
SELECT facility_name, location, operational_cost FROM facilities WHERE facility_name LIKE 'Facility%'
SELECT * FROM facility_data;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facility_data;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, total_energy_consumption FROM facility_data ORDER BY total_energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_meter WHERE facility_id = 100;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, current_reading, last_reading_date FROM energy_meter ORDER BY last_reading_date ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facility_data;
SELECT facility_name, total_energy_consumption FROM facility_data WHERE total_energy_consumption > 10000;
SELECT facility_name, location, current_reading FROM facility_data JOIN energy_meter ON facility_data.facility_id = energy_meter.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_meter WHERE last_reading_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT facility_name, cost_per_kwh FROM facility_data JOIN energy_meter ON facility_data.facility_id = energy_meter.facility_id JOIN energy_cost ON energy_meter.meter_id = energy_cost.meter_id WHERE cost_per_kwh < 0.15;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facilities WHERE facility_name LIKE 'Facility%';
SELECT building_id, building_name, building_size_sqft FROM buildings ORDER BY building_size_sqft DESC;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, installation_date FROM energy_meters WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.usage_id, e.usage_date, e.energy_consumed_kwh, em.meter_type FROM energy_usage e JOIN energy_meters em ON e.meter_id = em.meter_id;
SELECT * FROM facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT building_name, building_size_sqft FROM buildings WHERE building_size_sqft > 5000;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, installation_date FROM energy_meters ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT e.usage_id, e.usage_date, e.energy_consumed_kwh, em.meter_type FROM energy_usage e JOIN energy_meters em ON e.meter_id = em.meter_id;
SELECT * FROM facility;
SELECT id, name, location FROM facility WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM facility WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM energy_meter ORDER BY installation_date DESC;

SELECT facility.name, energy_reading.reading_date, energy_reading.reading FROM facility INNER JOIN energy_meter ON facility.id = energy_meter.facility_id INNER JOIN energy_reading ON energy_meter.id = energy_reading.meter_id WHERE facility.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM facility;
SELECT name, location FROM facility ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT facility.name, facility_address.city, facility_manager.manager_name FROM facility INNER JOIN facility_address ON facility.id = facility_address.facility_id INNER JOIN facility_manager ON facility.id = facility_manager.facility_id;

SELECT energy_meter.id, energy_meter.meter_type, energy_reading.reading_date FROM energy_meter INNER JOIN energy_reading ON energy_meter.id = energy_reading.meter_id WHERE energy_meter.unit = 'KWH' ORDER BY energy_reading.reading_date DESC;

SELECT facility.name AS facility_name, facility_address.address_line AS facility_address, facility_manager.manager_email AS manager_email FROM facility LEFT JOIN facility_address ON facility.id = facility_address.facility_id LEFT JOIN facility_manager ON facility.id = facility_manager.facility_id WHERE facility.id = 3;
